passive.name: Long Night
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. Increases the wearer's Skill and Ultimate DMG by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>. After the wearer uses their Skill or Ultimate, they gain Somnus Corpus. Upon triggering a follow-up attack, Somnus Corpus will be consumed and the follow-up attack DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color>.
